content: We -- as the numbers demonstrate, we obviously are going to have big gyrations on our investment book and we made almost $400 million last year in that book and this first quarter, we lost some money and obviously as the markets – as the markets continue to come in, we'll lose some money there, but the base business is incredibly strong and I'm really excited about the cash flows that will be generated when we have both the base business -- excuse me, the recurring business and the episodic clicking at the same time, which we will.
